divs: Sighting DetailsLiving in the country we get clear views of our local skys. On this night it was clear with no clouds. As I looked up, on this night, I noticed a nonflashing light flying right above my home. The light was not high enough to be a plane and what I thought was stranger yet was that it made no noise as it passed over my home. Right after it passed over my home I took a picture using my cell phone. In the photo I sent with this report might seem to be a pic of nothing but black sky but I ask you to please use your computer to in large the pic and focus on the light. When you inlarge the pic you will see a strange looking object. After the object flew East for about 5 min. the light just shut off. It might be nothing but hope this might help in someway
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around May 23rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
